lines.body: I agree. In fact, we should learn more bees.
To do so, fly around the beehive and talk to the different bees frolicking around.
You can move using the WASD keys.
Interact with other bees using the ENTER key.
Each bee will tell you something very poggers about BEES!
I must say, we Bees contribute so much to the environment!
Did you know that bees pollinate 75% of the flowering plants and 35% of food crops around the world?
In other words, nothing would be alive without bees [LMAO]
